words.def: a cunning or deceitful action or device
a painful muscle spasm especially in the neck or back (`rick' and `wrick' are British)
a large and densely populated urban area
A cocktail made with a measure of crème de cassis  topped up with white wine.
a case for containing a set of articles
earnest and conscientious activity intended to do or accomplish something
a local and habitual twitching especially in the face
Ti, a plant native to the Pacific islands and China, Cordyline fruticosa.
a light strong grey lustrous corrosion-resistant metallic element used in strong lightweight alloys (as for airplane parts)
the branch of engineering that deals with the use of computers and telecommunications to retrieve and store and transmit information
